amendatorysection.para: Depreciable tangible personal property shall mean tangible personal property which is used in a trade or business or used for the production of income and which has a determinable life of longer than one year.

annotation.para: Section 77-101 did not require the definition of "[d]epreciable tangible personal property" in this section to be used to define "depreciable repairs or parts" in section 77-2708.01, because the term "repairs" in section 77-2708.01 made the phrases contextually different. Farmers Co-op v. State, 296 Neb. 347, 893 N.W.2d 728 (2017).
